data.actual_result: The search just continues like it wasn't stopped.
data.expected_result: The search is already stopped because you did stop it.
data.short_description: Starting the nearby friends search then stopping it then clicking on "Learn more" then closing the custom Chrome tab, causes the search to auto start.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the nearby friends screen and start the search. - Stop the search. - Click on learn more. - Close the custom Chrome tab to come back to Discord.
